sourcesContent:
<template>
    <a-layout class="layout min-vh-100">
        <Sidebar v-model="collapsed" :width="sidebarWidth" :style="sidebarStyles"/>

        <a-layout class="layout" :style="styles">
            <Header v-model="collapsed" :style="headerStyles"/>
            <Content :style="contentStyles">
                <router-view/>
            </Content>
            <Footer/>
        </a-layout>
    </a-layout>
</template>

<script>
    import Header from "./header/Header";
    import Footer from './footer/Footer'
    import Content from "./content/Content";
    import Sidebar from "./sidebar/Sidebar";
    import {mapState} from 'vuex';

    export default {
        name: "Layout",
        components: {Header, Content, Footer, Sidebar},
        data() {
            return {
                collapsed: false,
                sidebarWidth: 256,
                sidebarCollapsedWidth: 80,
                headerHeight: 64
            }
        },
        computed: {
            ...mapState({
                theme: state => state.setting.theme,
                user: state => state.account.user
            }),
            styles() {
                const fixedSidebar = this.theme.themeFixedSidebar;

                if (fixedSidebar) return {
                    marginLeft: `${this.collapsed ? this.sidebarCollapsedWidth : this.sidebarWidth}px`
                };
                else return {}
            },
            sidebarStyles() {
                const fixedSidebar = this.theme.themeFixedSidebar;
                if (fixedSidebar) return {
                    position: 'fixed',
                    overflow: 'auto',
                    height: '100vh',
                    left: 0
                };
                else return {}
            },
            headerStyles() {
                const fixedHeader = this.theme.themeFixedHeader;

                if (fixedHeader) return {
                    position: 'fixed',
                    right: 0,
                    top: 0,
                    left: `${this.collapsed ? this.sidebarCollapsedWidth : this.sidebarWidth}px`
                };
                else return {};
            },
            contentStyles() {
                const fixedHeader = this.theme.themeFixedHeader;

                if (fixedHeader) return {
                    marginTop: `${this.headerHeight}px`
                };
                else return {};
            }
        },
        mounted() {
            this.collapsed = this.theme.themeCollapsedSidebar;
            this.$on('collapsed', value => this.collapsed = value);
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="scss" src="./Layout.scss"/>
